desc: Task: Design and develop template videos on Animaker using only Animaker's Whiteboard Animation style.Objective: Rather than start from scratch using a blank canvas, Animaker subscribers seeking to create Whiteboard Animation videos will use the templates to create their own videos in quick time.Start Date: ImmediateGuidelines: Videos to be created using Animaker’s FREE version and "Whiteboard Animation" style. Should give the look & feel of a template for re-use by Animaker subscribers. Should be creative, appealing, original, legal, non-violent & non-offensive. Incorporate BG Music, Voice-Over (record) and Photos (import) as appropriate & relevant. There are a total of 5 different styles available within Animaker Whiteboard: Whiteboard, Blackboard, Notepad, Glassboard and Stitchboard. User also has the option to publish these videos in Vertical video format. Should create template videos by proportionately using all of the 5 styles and the vertical video format.Each Video Duration: Ideally 30 seconds; Between 20 - 60 Seconds.Number of videos to create: 30Script: Click to access sample scripts: [url removed, login to view]; You may come up with scripts on your own and use them to create the template videos.Register for a FREE Account: [url removed, login to view]; Tutorials: [url removed, login to view]; Blog: [url removed, login to view];Reference Videos:Birthday Greeting: [url removed, login to view]Social Video: [url removed, login to view]Explainer Video: [url removed, login to view]Deliverable: Share "Animo" URL from Animaker Dashboard for review.Action Requests: 1. Please quote a fee to create each video. 2. Share your timeline to create each video._______________________________________________________________________________________________What is Animaker? It is an award winning, patent pending, Do-It-Yourself, SaaS based visual content creation suite on cloud. Empowers subscribers for visual content creation with its easy to use, creative & affordable platform. Gold Sponsor at Content Marketing World 2017 ([url removed, login to view]).Why? When compared with competitors, it takes only a fraction of the time & only 1% of the cost to create visual content on Animaker.Who? 1 Million+ subscribers from 180 countries have created over a Million videos. Startups, Graphic Designers, Teachers, Website Designers, Storytellers, Trainers, Digital Marketers, and Content Creators & Sales Executives benefit from using Animaker. 78+ Fortune 500 cos. including Wal-Mart, Ford, GE, GM, AT&T, HP, Microsoft, Wells Fargo, P&G, PepsiCo, Cisco Systems, Dow Chemicals & FedEx use Animaker.Assets: World’s largest library of animated assets: Characters with pre-built actions, Layouts, Icons & 3000 animated maps; Sound FX, BG Music, Stock Photos.World’s 1st: Vertical Video-maker; Video Infographics; Right To Left Typography for Arabic, Hebrew & Persian; DIY Creative Suite.Features: Voice-Over - Record own voice/ Import voice/ Use TTS engine; Import Photos; Multi-Camera Zoom; Curve Animation; Content creation in any language.Content Type: Storytelling Videos, Explainer Videos, VC Pitch Deck, Promotion Videos, Personal Branding Videos, Training and Educational Videos.Content Style: Video Infographics, 2D, Whiteboard, Handcraft, Typography, Vertical, Infographics, Posters, GIFs & Presentations.Recognition:Recommended: Neil Patel recommends Animaker - [url removed, login to view] - September 2017Listed: 1 of 9 Fantastic Content Marketing Tools under Budget - Huffington Post - March 2016Nominated: 1 of 75 hot startups to watch - TheNextWeb Summit - Amsterdam 	- April 2015Awarded: Startup Award in IT/ Services - Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) - November 2014Action Requests:  1. Timeline: Share timeline to create each video; 2. Compensation: Please quote a fee to create each video.
